SMS

Class _KCM_SMS

  • java.lang.Object
    • ezjcom.JComObject
      • SMS._KCM_SMS

  • public class _KCM_SMS
extends JComObject
    This class corresponds to a COM interface. Objects of this class are not created directly, but are obtained by calling methods of other COM objects.

        Sending_sms.

        Parameter id is an IN/OUT parameter. It requires an initialized array of size 1.
        Parameter pass is an IN/OUT parameter. It requires an initialized array of size 1.
        Parameter msg_count is an IN/OUT parameter. It requires an initialized array of size 1.
        Parameter Sending_datatime is an IN/OUT parameter. It requires an initialized array of size 1.
        Parameter Sending_msg is an IN/OUT parameter. It requires an initialized array of size 1.
        Parameter man_list_and_Phone_no is an IN/OUT parameter. It requires an initialized array of size 1.
        Parameter Call_back_no is an IN/OUT parameter. It requires an initialized array of size 1.
